Portuguese newspaper Record report Victor Lindelof could have a medical at United on Wednesday ahead of a £35million move.

The 22-year-old came close to moving to Old Trafford in the January transfer window but a deal never materialised.

But he is now an odds-on favourite to be at United next season, writes Manchester Evening News reporter Charlotte Duncker .

According to a report in The Sun , the defender will sign a five-year deal to join United from Benfica.
